name: Awesome Jelly Soda Crush Drink Maker Restaurant
name_original: Awesome Jelly Soda Crush Drink Maker Restaurant
description:
Bringing you awesome Jelly Soda drinks from the Restaurant!

Features:
- Pour your water
- Choose your flavor
- Add some fizz
- Choose your cup, cap, and straws
- DRINK IT! REFILL IT! DRINK IT AGAIN!

Dozens to choose from: Flavors, cups, caps, decors, stickers and more!!


Download Awesome Jelly Soda Crush Drink Maker Restaurant right now and have fun making and mixing!

PLEASE NOTE:
- Awesome Jelly Soda Crush Drink Maker Restaurant is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.
